Uses of Package
org.actioncontroller.values

  • Packages that use org.actioncontroller.values 
    Package Description
    org.actioncontroller.values  
  • Classes in org.actioncontroller.values used by org.actioncontroller.values 
    Class Description
    ClientCertificate
    Extract the HTTPS Client Certificate from the request
    ContentBody
    Set the return value in the content body with an optional content-type
    ContentLocationHeader
    Set the method return value into the Content-location response header as String or URL.
    ContextUrl
    Extract the context URL into the parameter as URL or String
    HttpHeader
    When used on a parameter, maps the HTTP Request header to the parameter, converting the type if necessary.
    HttpResponseHeader
    Maps the return value to the specified HTTP Response header
    IfModifiedSince  
    LastModified  
    PathParam
    Maps part of the HTTP request target to the parameter, converting the type if necessary.
    QueryString
    Maps the raw query part of the HTTP request target to the parameter.
    RequestParam
    Maps the HTTP request parameter to the parameter, converting the type if necessary.
    RequestParam.ClientIp
    Maps the HTTP client IP to the parameter as String.
    RequestParam.RemoteUser
    NOT SUPPORTED ON JdkHttpExchange.
    SendRedirect
    Maps the method response value as an HTTP 302 redirect, supporting Strings and URLs.
    ServletUrl  
    SessionParameter
    Maps the parameter to the specified servlet session.
    TypeConverter  
    UnencryptedCookie
    Maps the parameter to the specified HTTP request cookie, URL decoding and converting the type if necessary.
    UserPrincipal
    Returns the remote principal for the request as set on the servlet container.
